reviewText: The blurb on the back of the video box says it all: "This video utilizes players of different ages and skill levels to demonstrate a variety of drills that coaches at all competitive levels can use to end basketball practice in a highly enjoyable way. One of the most important coaching techniques is learning how to balance discipline and fun. [both] must be integrated together or both lose their effectiveness. This video shows how coaches can conclude their practices by "rewarding" their players, having them leave smiling, wanting more, and looking forward to the next practice session.  Among the topics covered: shooting games; ballhandling games and drills; competitive games and game situations; coaching pointers."
